value.string:
from Products.ZSQLCatalog.SQLCatalog import NegatedQuery, Query
 
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 person_uid = portal.ERP5Site_getPropertyFromAuthenticatedMemberPersonValue('uid')
 person_reference = portal.ERP5Site_getPropertyFromAuthenticatedMemberPersonValue('reference')
 
 setup_service = portal.restrictedTraverse(portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredInstanceSetupResource())
 
 # XXX Owner column should not be used to fetch the list!
 # Data model of hosting subscription should be fixed to allow direct query
 hosting_subscription_list = portal.portal_catalog(
 portal_type="Hosting Subscription",
 owner=person_reference,
 )
 
 # Only return ongoing hosting subscription
 return [x for x in hosting_subscription_list if \
 (len(portal.portal_catalog(
 portal_type="Sale Packing List Line",
 simulation_state=NegatedQuery(Query(simulation_state="delivered")),
 default_resource_uid=setup_service.getUid(),
 default_aggregate_uid=x.getUid(),
 limit=1,
 )) == 1) or \
 (len(portal.portal_catalog(
 portal_type="Sale Packing List Line",
 default_resource_uid=setup_service.getUid(),
 default_aggregate_uid=x.getUid(),
 limit=1,
 )) == 0)]
